_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: vps
author: dxomg129@protonmail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/sh
cd /mnt/server

# Remove all files and directories inside the container
rm -rf *

# Remove .installed
rm -rf .installed

apk update
apk add curl

url="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xXGAN2Xx/proot-nour/refs/heads/main/PteroVM.sh"
max_retries=10
timeout=5
retry_interval=1

i=1
while [ $i -le $max_retries ]; do
    curl -m $timeout -O $url && break || (
        echo "Retry in $retry_interval seconds..."
        sleep $retry_interval
    )
    i=$((i+1))
done
